ourSalonPara1.text: On January 23, we opened our first salon in the city of Montreal, located at 9535 Bd Lacordaire Montreal (St-Leonard) Quebec, H1R 2B6 . We are proud to report that we have a salon run 100% by the Soins Karismä team.

ourSalonPara2.text: On January 23, we opened our first salon in the city of Montreal, located at 9535 Bd Lacordaire Montreal (St-Leonard) Quebec, H1R 2B6 . We are proud to report that we have a salon run 100% by the Soins Karismä team. After months of hard work, searching for the best beauty professionals, we have found trained professionals with more than 10 years of experience in the industry.

ourSalonPara3.text: We have developed a model to provide the best experience in our salons, in this location you will find larger spaces, a waiting room where we will attend you comfortably, we will wait for you with mimosas and much more!

ourSalonPara4.text: This salon offers more than 20 different services, from hair, nail, eyebrow, waxing, facial, aesthetic and many more services, so if you are in the city of Montreal, do not hesitate to schedule your appointment through our online platform.
